radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echogenicity and contour without focal liver lesion. Mild intrahepatic biliary dilation is seen. The CBD measures up to 5 mm. The gallbladder is mildly distended and contains sludge. A stone is present within the gallbladder neck which does not appear to move with repositioning. The gallbladder wall is not thickened. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. The spleen is not enlarged measuring 11.4 cm. Limited views of the pancreas are unremarkable.
